review: I've had several Roku models over the year but I decided to give the Fire Stick a shot. I love it. The menu and remote is easier to use and it's hidden away behind the TV now.  Have had zero problems with freezing screens as I do with Roku.

review: Inexpensive way to make a TV "smart". Better value than Chromecast and allows me to steam amazon and for $5, I get plex. Would have been a steal had the app been included, but regardless, great product.

review: I had a little problem until I added a wifi extender and I'm not sure how or if I can view Prime on my computer as well as on my HDTV without more apparatus. I have not tried seriously to access Netflix with which some Prime responders said they had significant problems, but I'm not all that enthused about their exclusive series anyway.  The wifi extender was problematic to install, because it came with instructions for a different appliance and even the instructions online were incomplete, but I read between the lines and figured it out.  Accessing Prime took a little getting used to, but I'm generally a quick study.
